newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: MBf Holdings up on merger talks.
newsitem.headline: MBf Holdings up on merger talks.

text.p: Shares of diversified group MBf Holdings Bhd rose on news that one of its units is involved in merger talks with a banking firm, dealers said.
Around 0215 GMT, the stock was up 5.30 percent or 7.0 cents to 1.39 ringgit.
Financial services firm MBf Capital Bhd, which is 31.52 percent owned by MBf Holdings, was suspended on Monday pending a news announcement.
"People are targetting MBf Holdings because the other one is suspended," said a retail dealer at Mayban Securities.
MBf Capital and Sabah-based banking firm Suria Capital Bhd may be heading for a merger after it was confirmed on Monday that they have submitted a proposal to the authorities to begin negotiations.
MBf Holdings is involved in finance, property, education, motor vehicles and other businesses.
